repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian:8.0 
MAINTAINER andystanton 
ENV LANG C.UTF-8 
RUN apt-get update -qq && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y patch && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
ADD image-common /tmp/dexec/image-common 
VOLUME /tmp/dexec/build 
ENTRYPOINT ["/tmp/dexec/image-common/dexec-script.sh", "bash"]
